definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: The studies of Foucault and New Historicism have aroused people's awareness of the discourse of power.
sentences.chinese: 福柯和新历史主义批评唤起了人们对权力话语的觉醒。

sentences.english: The fourth part of the paper is history methodology Evaluation of Foucault.
sentences.chinese: 文章第四部分是对福柯史学方法论的评价。

sentences.english: and Foucault is the primary influence on the New Historicism.
sentences.chinese: 福柯是对新历史主义影响最大的人。

sentences.english: You can't say, 'If it's Tuesday, it must be Foucault.
sentences.chinese: 你不能说，如果今天是周二，我们就讲福柯。

sentences.english: Foucault is one of the important representatives of post-modernism philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 福柯是后现代主义哲学的主要代表之一。

sentences.english: With the emergency of Foucault's post-modern philosophy, traditional philosophy was buried thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 而后现代福柯的出现，则彻底埋葬了传统哲学。

sentences.english: Genealogy provide a methodological basis for Foucault's thought about the body.
sentences.chinese: 谱系学为福柯有关身体的思想提供了方法论基础。

sentences.english: Foucault replied to Sartre on several occasions.
sentences.chinese: 而福柯则在好几个场合答复了萨特。

sentences.english: How does Foucault deal with this? He invents a concept.
sentences.chinese: 那么福柯是怎么处理的呢？，他发明了一个理论。

sentences.english: Based on this, the thesis reviews Foucaults inimitable conception of power.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，考察了福柯别开生面的权力观。

sentences.english: Write a brief essay on how Foucault conceives this coupling.
sentences.chinese: 简述福柯如何思考这二者的联结。

definition: surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
Jean Baudrillard (1929-2007), French cultural theorist and philosopher
Baruch or Benedict Spinoza (1632-1677), rationalist philosopher

pinyin: Fa3 lan2 ke4 fu2 Xue2 pai4
